Interface ModifiableShape

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleShape, RectangleShape, TriangleShape
public interface ModifiableShape
Holds common methods for shapes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Color getColor()
    Returns current color of a shape.
    boolean isInside​(float x, float y)
    Checks if a given point is inside a shape.
    void move​(float x, float y)
    Moves shape by given offsets.
    void scale​(float scalingFactor)
    Scales shape by a given factor.
    void setColor​(java.awt.Color color)
    Changes color of a shape.

  • Method Details

    • scale

      void scale​(float scalingFactor)
      Scales shape by a given factor.
      Parameters:
      scalingFactor - scaling factor

    • move

      void move​(float x, float y)
      Moves shape by given offsets.
      Parameters:
      x - x offset
      y - y offset

    • setColor

      void setColor​(java.awt.Color color)
      Changes color of a shape.
      Parameters:
      color - color

    • getColor

      java.awt.Color getColor()
      Returns current color of a shape.
      Returns:
      current color of a shape.

    • isInside

      boolean isInside​(float x, float y)
      Checks if a given point is inside a shape.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Returns:
      boolean value
